column3: Department of Civil and Structural Engineering
column5: This course focuses on how to analyse and design structures. We teach the use of innovative concepts and methodologies to provide an ideal grounding for an international career in structural design and construction.On this course you'll discover a range of modern and innovative construction materials, analysis and design methods.You'll study the crucial infrastructure that we all depend on, learning how to make it safer, more efficient and sustainable, and better able to withstand earthquakes, fire and explosions.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
